price: Maze (umugabo) abonye ikanzu ye (Yusufu) yacitse inyuma, aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ibi ni bimwe mu mayeri yanyu abagore! Rwose, amayeri yanyu arahambaye.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيۡدِكُنَّۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falammā raā qamīṣahu qudda min duburin qāla innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna ʿaẓīmun
